revision.text: This is a link from A B to [[B C]] in the first sentence. This is the second link in this page and it goes from A B to [[A A B]], which is a redirect.
These page contents should be ignored. Also this link to [[B C]].
This is another link to [[A B|a b]] with a custom alternative link text.

This is another link to [[A B|a b]] with a custom alternative link text. And an unlinked occurrence of the same a b anchor text. And an unlinked almost-occurrence of the same a bc anchor text.
This is a placeholder sentence. And another unlinked occurrence of the same a b anchor text. And another unlinked almost-occurrence of the same a bc anchor text.
This is a link-less page with a table: {| | cell 1 | cell 2 |}
